item.title: Spirit Airlines Files For Bankruptcy Again But Vows to Keep Flying
item.description: The budget airline is considering selling real estate and some of its aircraft.

item.title: Senator Sanders Says US Health Secretary Kennedy Must Resign
item.description: Four CDC officials resigned in protest to the firing of Susan Monarez, the director of the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention.

item.title: US Still Working on Trade Deals Despite Court Ruling, USTR Says
item.description: The U.S. Court of Appeals for the Federal Circuit determined Trump’s tariffs are illegal.

item.title: What Business Leaders Can Learn From the Fresh-Start Effect of the Back-to-School Season
item.description: This phenomenon is an essential part of every company’s culture.

item.title: 10 Financial Metrics Every CEO Should Monitor
item.description: Skip the vanity metrics. Instead, track the signals that ignite growth.
